aka: Pinkfong音樂電影：奇幻之星嘉年華(港)
碰碰狐音樂電影 : 奇幻城嘉年華

cast.name: 科琳·欧肖内希 Colleen O'Shaughnessey

trans_title: 碰碰狐音乐电影：奇幻城嘉年华
Pinkfong音樂電影：奇幻之星嘉年華(港)
碰碰狐音樂電影 : 奇幻城嘉年華
introduction: Wonderville's favorite problem-solving duo, Pinkfong and Hogi, assembles a group of friends to produce their first-ever live concert. The crew must learn to come together as a team and compromise as they create the ultimate interactive experience with sing-along lyrics and matching choreography. Pinkfong Sing-Along Movie 2: Wonderstar Concert is a sequel to the movie Pinkfong & Baby Shark’s Space Adventure (2020), filled with Pinkfong's most beloved songs, including the global mega-hit, Baby Shark!
chinese_title: 碰碰狐音乐电影：奇幻城嘉年华
